column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I 'll be right back . "
#Text=Korra says : " Excuse me , did you happen to see if Prince Wu came out this way ? "
#Text=Bathroom attendant says : " Sorry miss , I have n't seen him . "
#Text=Wu says : " Hmm , I 'm in laundry ... " Korra says : " They 've got Wu !
#Text=" Korra says : " We 're losing them !
#Text=" Mako says : " Hang a right at the next block .
#Text=We can cut them off on Seventh .
#Text=" Mako says : " You missed the turn !
#Text=Where are you going ?!
#Text=" Asami says : " I know these streets better than you .
#Text=I built some of them !
#Text=" Mako says : " What are you doing ?
#Text=Sit down !
#Text=" Korra says : " Where is he ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Wu 's not here .
#Text=This guy was the only one in the truck .
#Text=" Mako says : " Where 's the prince ?
#Text=" Bathroom attendant says : " Halfway to Kuvira by now .
#Text=All hail the Great Uniter .
#Text=" Asami says : " They must have moved Wu to a different vehicle when we lost sight of them .
#Text=" Mako says : " Take this guy in for booking .
#Text=Charge him with kidnapping and tell Chief Beifong that Prince Wu is missing .
#Text=Put out an all - points bulletin .
#Text=We 'll keep looking .
#Text=" Asami says : " Where do we start ?
#Text=There are thousands of cars in the city and he could be in any one of them .
#Text=" Mako says : " Or they might try smuggling him out on an airship .
#Text=" Asami says : " Or maybe a boat .
#Text=" Mako says : " He could be anywhere !
#Text=The one time I do n't watch him pee and this is what happens .
#Text=" Korra says : " They 're taking Wu to the train station !
#Text=" Asami says : " Are you sure ?
#Text=How do you know ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll explain on the way , just drive !
#Text=We 're running out of time !
#Text="
